subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Looking back to Karen Hantze Susman’s era, when female players received scant attention and few considered it a viable career option, provides perspective on how far women’s tennis has come.
snippet: Looking back to Karen Hantze Susman’s era, when female players received scant attention and few considered it a viable career option, provides perspective on how far women’s tennis has come.
